com.paritytrading.foundation

Class ByteBuffers

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paritytrading.foundation.ByteBuffers

  • public class ByteBuffers
extends Object
    This class contains methods for manipulating byte buffers.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static void get(ByteBuffer src,
                       byte[] dst,
                       int index)
        Absolute bulk get method.

        This method transfers bytes from the source buffer into the given destination array.

        Parameters:
        src - the source buffer
        dst - the destination array
        index - the index from which the bytes will be read
        Throws:
        BufferUnderflowException - if there are fewer bytes than the length of the array between the index and the limit

      • get

        public static void get(ByteBuffer src,
                       byte[] dst,
                       int index,
                       int offset,
                       int length)
        Absolute bulk get method.

        This method transfers bytes from the source buffer into the given destination array.

        Parameters:
        src - the source buffer
        dst - the destination array
        index - the index from which the bytes will be read
        offset - the offset within the array of the first byte to be written
        length - the number of bytes to be written to the array
        Throws:
        BufferUnderflowException - if there are fewer bytes than the length between the index and the limit
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the preconditions on the offset and length do not hold

      • put

        public static void put(ByteBuffer dst,
                       byte[] src,
                       int index)
        Absolute bulk put method.

        This method transfers bytes from the source array to the destination buffer.

        Parameters:
        dst - the destination buffer
        src - the source array
        index - the index at which the bytes will be written
        Throws:
        BufferOverflowException - if there are fewer bytes than the length of the array between the index and the limit

      • put

        public static void put(ByteBuffer dst,
                       byte[] src,
                       int index,
                       int offset,
                       int length)
        Absolute bulk put method.

        This method transfers bytes from the source array to the destination buffer.

        Parameters:
        dst - the destination buffer
        src - the source array
        index - the index at which the bytes will be written
        offset - the offset within the array of the first byte to be written
        length - the number of bytes to be written to the buffer
        Throws:
        BufferOverflowException - if there are fewer bytes than the length between the index and the limit
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the preconditions on the offset and length do not hold

      • getUnsigned

        public static short getUnsigned(ByteBuffer buffer)
        Relative get method for reading an unsigned byte.
        Parameters:
        buffer - a buffer
        Returns:
        the unsigned byte
        Throws:
        BufferUnderflowException - if there are no bytes remaining in the buffer

      • getUnsigned

        public static short getUnsigned(ByteBuffer buffer,
                                int index)
        Absolute get method for reading an unsigned byte.
        Parameters:
        buffer - a buffer
        index - the index from which the unsigned byte will be read
        Returns:
        the unsigned byte at the given index
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is negative or not smaller than the buffer's limit

      • putUnsigned

        public static void putUnsigned(ByteBuffer buffer,
                               short b)
        Relative put method for writing an unsigned byte.
        Parameters:
        buffer - a buffer
        b - the unsigned byte
        Throws:
        BufferOverflowException - if there are no bytes remaining in the buffer
        ReadOnlyBufferException - if the buffer is read-only

      • putUnsigned

        public static void putUnsigned(ByteBuffer buffer,
                               int index,
                               short b)
        Absolute put method for writing an unsigned byte.
        Parameters:
        buffer - a buffer
        index - the index at which the unsigned byte will be written
        b - the unsigned byte
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is negative or not smaller than the buffer's limit
        ReadOnlyBufferException - if the buffer is read-only

      • getUnsignedShort

        public static int getUnsignedShort(ByteBuffer buffer)
        Relative get method for reading an unsigned short value.
        Parameters:
        buffer - a buffer
        Returns:
        the unsigned short value
        Throws:
        BufferUnderflowException - if there are fewer than two bytes remaining in the buffer

      • getUnsignedShort

        public static int getUnsignedShort(ByteBuffer buffer,
                                   int index)
        Absolute get method for reading an unsigned short value.
        Parameters:
        buffer - a buffer
        index - the index from which the unsigned short value will be read
        Returns:
        the unsigned short value at the given index
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is negative or not smaller than the buffer's limit, minus one

      • putUnsignedShort

        public static void putUnsignedShort(ByteBuffer buffer,
                                    int value)
        Relative put method for writing an unsigned short value.
        Parameters:
        buffer - a buffer
        value - the unsigned short value
        Throws:
        BufferOverflowException - if there are fewer than two bytes remaining in the buffer
        ReadOnlyBufferException - if the buffer is read-only

      • getUnsignedInt

        public static long getUnsignedInt(ByteBuffer buffer)
        Relative get method for reading an unsigned integer value.
        Parameters:
        buffer - a buffer
        Returns:
        the unsigned integer value
        Throws:
        BufferUnderflowException - if there are fewer than four bytes remaining in the buffer

      • getUnsignedInt

        public static long getUnsignedInt(ByteBuffer buffer,
                                  int index)
        Absolute get method for reading an unsigned integer value.
        Parameters:
        buffer - a buffer
        index - the index from which the unsigned integer value will be read
        Returns:
        the unsigned integer value at the given index
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is negative or not smaller than the buffer's limit, minus three

      • putUnsignedInt

                                  long value)

        Parameters:

        value - the unsigned integer value
        Throws:

        ReadOnlyBufferException - if the buffer is read-only
